about_the_game:
Cosmic Trouble is a dark-comedy adventure game with edgy characters, bizarre dialogue, and mind-puréeing puzzles that’ll make you question outdated concepts like reality and the whole capitalist system. Aya is tired of the whole thing and she is ready to make some changes (Spoiler: she can't do much about capitalism).  

Welcome to Crestfallen, a desolate city where crime and corruption thrive, good people turn bad, and bad people turn worse. The only thing dirtier than the local industry is the politicians, and let me tell you, they’re as dirty as it gets. Need a job? Best not even think about it. Looking for love? Well, good luck finding it in this cesspool of a town. This place is where old hopes and dreams come to die.  

Having said that, enjoy your stay!  

Features: 

  • Story: Stuff happens! 

  • Graphics: Colorful pixels! 

  • Audio: Pleasant air vibrations! 

  • User Input: Press those buttons! 

  • Content: Amazing! 

This game is NOT for you, if...  

  • ... you hate fun (and/or cats) 

  • ... you love stress (or maybe you are just running away from something?) 

  • ... you are afraid of new experiences (sure, they are scary, I understand)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card with at least 512MB Shared VRAM & OpenGL 2.0 support
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card with at least 512MB Shared VRAM & OpenGL 2.0 support

short_description: A dark-comedy adventure set in the desolate coastal city of Crestfallen, where Aya must confront her inner darkness, deal with a tech-bro cult and still find time to feed her cat.
